recorderSession.description: Test of controls inside of shared flows

header.name: accept
header.value: image/gif, image/x-xbitmap, image/jpeg, image/pjpeg, application/x-shockwave-flash, application/vnd.ms-excel, application/vnd.ms-powerpoint, application/msword, */*

header.name: user-agent
header.value: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0; Windows NT 5.1; SV1; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; InfoPath.1)

response.responseBody:
Control Lifecycle Test 2

This test will run a control that is found in a shared flow to verify that it is called during the onCreate, begin action and as a property accessor.

onCreate message'Echo: 'shared flow access -- controls.lifecycle.ControlLifecycleController''
begin message'Echo: 'shared flow access -- controls.lifecycle.ControlLifecycleController''
property access message'Echo: 'shared flow access -- controls.lifecycle.ControlLifecycleController''
